title: RVG Educational Foundation Scholarship 2025
eligibility: Applicants must meet the following criteria: This scholarship is applicable to all states. This scholarship is exclusively applicable to both genders. RVG Merit Scholarship: The scholarship is available to RVGians who are rank holders in the CA IPC examination (both groups in one attempt). The scholarship will continue until the completion of the Articleship as per ICAI’s Registration Letter or the stay in RVG Hostel, whichever comes first. If the Articleship period is extended for any reason, the scholarship eligibility will cease on the original expiry date mentioned in the Registration Letter. If a recipient is found involved in any disciplinary violations, they will lose their eligibility for the scholarship and may face penalties. RVG Financial Assistance Scholarship: Economic Background: Deserving RVGians from economically weaker sections or humble backgrounds. Interview: Applicants will appear before a panel for an interview. Duration: The scholarship continues until the completion of the Articleship as per ICAI’s Registration Letter or the stay in RVG Hostel, whichever comes first. Articleship Extension: If the Articleship period is extended, the scholarship eligibility ceases on the original expiry date mentioned in the Registration Letter. Disciplinary Actions: If a recipient is found involved in any disciplinary violations, they will lose their eligibility for the scholarship and may face penalties. Applicants must receive less than Rs. 7500/- per month. Note: This scholarship is only applicable to those who are enrolled in the RVG Educational Foundation.
description: RVG Educational Foundation (formerly Rajasthan Vidyarthi Griha) has established a Scholarship Corpus Fund to provide RVG Merit Scholarships to meritorious RVGians who are rank holders in the CA IPC examination. This scholarship is available until the completion of their Articleship as per ICAI’s Registration Letter or their stay in RVG, whichever is earlier.
